data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Chikballapura, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chikballapura, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Chikballapura, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Chikballapura.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 13,806 believers in Chikballapura, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Vakkaliga Gangadikara people might believe through him.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Chikballapura.
Lord, help the people of Chikballapura, Karnataka, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Chikballapura, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
